data.what_is: Cinch saves you time. It is a lot of work to analyze customer purchase data. It requires a quality team to know how to parse that out and establish the proper personas and target your best customers. Because of this, most companies use marketing automation the same way for everyone. It takes too much time to do it any other way. Until now. Cinch is saving marketers time and resources through our patented value and predictive buying tools. We help you target customers when they are ready to buy. We do this through unique processes by analyzing both your customer day as well as appended third-party data. All this is included in every Cinch plan. That is why we call it Marketing Enablement.
data.product_description: Cinch saves you time. It is a lot of work to analyze customer purchase data. It requires a quality team to know how to parse that out and establish the proper personas and target your best customers. Because of this, most companies use marketing automation the same way for everyone. It takes too much time to do it any other way. Until now. Cinch is saving marketers time and resources through our patented value and predictive buying tools. We help you target customers when they are ready to buy. We do this through unique processes by analyzing both your customer day as well as appended third-party data. All this is included in every Cinch plan. That is why we call it Marketing Enablement.

initial_reviews.review_title: Customer Journeys allow us to send emails when customers need/want them
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Cinch Marketing Automation?
Aside from the eblasts that we do, Cinch allows us to send emails when a customer is coming due, due, and past due for service. Their customer service is also top knotch!

What do you dislike about Cinch Marketing Automation?
There is nothing that I dislike about Cinch, it's an amazing product.

What problems is Cinch Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Cinch allows us to send emails only when a customer needs and/or wants it. It has helped cut down on the number of emails that are being sent to spam. This has increased our email reputation as well.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Cinch Marketing Automation?
We appreciate the fact that we can see which campaigns are performing best. The reporting has been clear and transparent, which we love.  CINCH has the capability of A/B testing multiple campaigns at once. We can test out our creative, subject lines, times sent, as well as specific groups/segments that we send to.

What do you dislike about Cinch Marketing Automation?
For the most part, everything has been great! We feel that the mailer side of CINCH could improve a little bit.

Recommendations to others considering Cinch Marketing Automation:
If you are looking for a more transparent dashboard of your email/mail/social media campaigns as well as a more complete reporting tool, CINCH is a great option to consider.

What problems is Cinch Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
We've been able to more strategically target our customers with the campaigns that they respond the best to. This has helped us feel more confident in the ROI that CINCH is reporting on.
